experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Developed the backend of 'Mesadoko' using Node.js. Led the SAS SIP Inventory project and transformed it into 'SuperMarket Inventory'. Improved web performance and managed servers and cloud services. Implemented innovative solutions in GitHub and accelerated documentation creation. Strengthened the company's security against DDoS attacks and cyber threats.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Led the development of the RCService administrative application for Arrendamientos del Norte. Developed a backend API using Node.js and Express. Created a web application for administrators with ReactJS. Developed a mobile app in React Native for clients.

Projects.title: 'Mesadoko'
Projects.subTitle: Mobile Learning App
Projects.description: I developed the backend with Node.js for the international Mesadoko project by Mesa Davis Enterprises LLC, contributing to its implementation while studying. It was my first large-scale project.

Projects.title: SAS SIP Inventory
Projects.subTitle: An Inventory Service for Supermarkets
Projects.description:
I led the SAS SIP Inventory web project as a full-stack developer, focusing on scalable and efficient solutions with ReactJS. I transformed SAS SIP Inventory into a generalized solution for supermarkets, called 'SuperMarket Inventory', leading all aspects of the development.
Note: Private application

Projects.title: RC SERVICE
Projects.subTitle: Training Project
Projects.description:
RCService is an administrative application designed to manage properties at the company Arrendamientos del Norte. It allows for registering and monitoring services such as electrical repairs, plumbing, painting, cleaning, and carpentry. Workers, both internal and external, can apply to perform these tasks, entering a hiring process.
Note: Test users are on GitHub.

AboutMe: My name is Brandon Quintero. I discovered the world of programming when I was 11 years old, thanks to the mods of Age of Empires 2. After that, I was introduced to the Kali Linux operating system, and from that moment, my passion for programming and cybersecurity began. Currently, I am collaborating with Disruptive IT as a freelance developer.
I led the backend development for an international project, Mesadoko, a mobile application from the company Mesa Davis Enterprises LLC in the USA, while I was still studying.

Leadership in Full-Stack Projects. I was responsible for the project SAS SIP Inventory, transforming it into a complete and scalable solution for supermarkets, called SuperMarket Inventory. I led all aspects of development and improved the efficiency of the implemented web solutions.

At the company, I enhanced the web performance of several products at Disruptive IT, mentoring teams, designing strategies, creating dashboards, and managing cloud services. This resulted in a 20% improvement in the overall performance of the company.
